section.title: Creating a repository
section.para: We want to have a separate repository for our p2 artifacts.
This can be created like this:

listitem.para: Login to the nexus (http://localhost:8081/nexus/) with User admin and password admin123.
Click on Repositories on the right hand side.
Select Add... > Hosted Repository and use the following data:

section.para: Now you got a custom repository, which is hosted on your local nexus installation.
